entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
